title: AI Image Generation and Mathematical Analysis Integration Workshop for Innovative Landscape Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in landscape design, experience with design software, understanding of geometric principles, and basic statistical concepts
context.additional_context: Program for practicing landscape professionals to expand design thinking and practical application skills by combining AI tools with mathematical analysis methods. Emphasizes mathematical approaches such as symmetry, proportion, and pattern optimization in spatial design.

learning_goals: Learners can develop the ability to visualize three or more landscape concepts using mathematical ratios (golden ratio, Fibonacci sequence, etc.) with AI image generation tools (Adobe Firefly, Midjourney, etc.).

Learners can cultivate the ability to analyze AI-generated results based on mathematical principles (geometric structures, space partitioning, pattern repetition) and integrate them into design processes.
Learners can cultivate the ability to concretize design ideas numerically by applying five or more prompt engineering techniques (variable adjustment, conditional statements, etc.).

resources: AI image generation tool free trial version

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
